summary: Implements a comprehensive argument‑parsing and tab‑completion framework for the Ansible test command‑line interface, including custom argparse actions, composable parsers for various data types, and a wrapper around the argcomplete library to provide intelligent Bash completions.
business_intent: Improve the usability and reliability of the Ansible test CLI by delivering precise argument validation and context‑aware auto‑completion, reducing user errors and streamlining test execution workflows.
